atlantis.framework

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.framework.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, IUpdateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameApplication

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDrawable, IUpdateable
    The Game class provide basic initialization and game logic. It implements GameState pattern.
    Author:
    Yannick
